info.name: DocuSign Rooms API - v2
info.description: An API for an integrator to access the features of DocuSign Rooms

item.name: Accounts
Get information about the account.
Documents

Deletes a document.
Grants access to a document for a user.

request.description: This endpoint supports the following content types, application/json as JSON PictureForUpdate{"fileName":"string", "Base64Contents":"string"}, multipart/formdata and any other streamed binary content type (as long as either query parameter fileName or request header ContentDisposition filename is included).

request.description:
Removes the user. Will fail if the user owns any Rooms. 
The rooms will need to be transferred to other agents before removing.

item.name: NON-CLASSIC COMPANY ONLY. Send an invitation to the user or non-user having the given email.
